page.title: 03FIVE MINUTES IN LONGSTANTON
page.content: Wednesday 26 June , 1120 a.m.{ { In Woodside}it is quiet. Leaves rustle, birds twitter. A Mercedes lorry approaches, followed by a Peugeot car and a Toyota 4x4 pick_up. Not one is British. A Lynx helicopter from the airfield gains height above. { In the High Street }cars come and go past Did_Dell's shop. The 155 bus in its new blue livery drops a couple at the Old People's flats. An army Land-Rover passes and Tracy's father waves. Tracy waves back, a little sadly: he is just leaving for Canada. An Army Air Corps helicopter flies by. {Opposite Colesfield}the wind sways the oilseed rape, beaten into tangled clumps by recent rain. Mrs Alsop pauses, and comes over to chat. A sparrow hops across the road as a red car leaves Colesfield. Above flies an army helicopter.....
